Test a scenario

Select calculations
Select Calculations
Full trace
Variable Used by Priority Value Dependencies
Enter data

This will be a form with a data entry for each dependency which has no further dependencies, prioritised by score.

Get results

This will be a return of /trace run from the form in the previous step with a result for each calculation from step 2, and a breakdown of the value of each of it's dependencies.
